tagline: Construct Your Focus, Build Your World.
mission: To empower professionals and creators to achieve deep work, eliminate distractions, and build a tangible representation of their productivity.

coreValues.description: We believe that meaningful accomplishments come from focused, uninterrupted effort. Our tools are designed to cultivate and protect this state of flow.
We make productivity visible and rewarding. Your effort doesn't just disappear; it builds your personal Metropolis, a city that grows with your achievements.
It's not just about doing more, but doing what matters. We encourage intentionality, planning, and reflection to ensure your work aligns with your goals.
For freelancers and professionals, time is money. We provide the tools to track billable hours, manage projects, and directly connect focus with financial outcomes.

tone.inApp: Clear, concise, and encouraging. Nudges you toward your goals without being intrusive.
tone.marketing: Aspirational and benefit-driven. Focuses on the transformation from distracted to focused, from busy to productive.

demographics.occupation: Software Developer, Designer, Writer, Consultant, Architect, Small Agency Owner
demographics.income: Varies, but values their time highly.

keyMessaging.headline: Arquiteck: Where Focus Builds Your Future.
keyMessaging.subheadline: The all-in-one productivity suite that transforms your time into tangible results. Plan your tasks, block distractions, and watch your digital metropolis rise with every completed goal.

pillars.message: Our customizable Pomodoro timer, complete with ambient sounds and a strict pause mode, is your shield against the chaos of the modern workplace. Commit to a task and we'll handle the rest.
Go from a cluttered inbox to a clear action plan. Capture ideas, prioritize tasks, and link them to clients and projects. Arquiteck is your command center for professional organization.

Don't just track your time, see it come to life. Every focused session builds your unique Metropolis. Plus, our analytics turn your effort into clear data, showing you where your time goes and how much you've earned.

uniqueSellingProposition: Arquiteck is the only productivity app that gamifies deep work by allowing you to build a virtual city with your focused effort, providing a powerful visual incentive to stay on task and a tangible representation of your achievements. It's not just a to-do list; it's a world-builder.
